# Description

My main interest and research theme is diversity and (in)equality in education within the urban context and my Ph.D. project is focused on the sense of belonging of diverse students in higher education.

# Expertise

```{r radarPlot, eval = TRUE}

member_name <- "Aike Dias-Broens"
special_skill <- c("qualitative methods", "literature search")

OS_skills <- read_csv(here("static/OS_skills.csv")) %>%
  dplyr::filter(name %in% c("max", "min", member_name)) %>%
  dplyr::select(c(all_of(special_skill), "open access", "open source software", "reproducible analysis", "data management", "data sharing", "preregistration"))

# custom radar plot
radarchart(OS_skills,
  axistype = 0, seg = 10,
  pcol = alpha("#002328", 0.8), pfcol = alpha("#00B969", 0.6), plwd = 4, centerzero = TRUE, # polygon
  cglcol = "#7e7e7e", axislabcol = "#002328", caxislabels = seq(0, 10, 2), cglwd = 0.8 # grid
)

```
